'''No Place for Banditry''' is a daily commission that occurs at [[Jinren Island]], [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A group of bandits has been sighted nearby, threating the safety of the surrounding areas. Head over there and take them out.}}
# Defeat all opponents 0/7

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}

==Enemies==
===Jinren Island===
Wave 1
*{{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban*2;Nobushi: Hitsukeban/spawns after aggro is obtained;Nobushi: Kikouban/spawns after aggro is obtained}}
Wave 2 (spawns after 3 enemies have been defeated)
*{{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}
